mapper.insert: insert into reply_spring (post_id, reply_contents, user_nickname) values ( #{post_id}, #{reply_contents}, #{user_nickname})
mapper.update: update reply_spring set reply_contents = #{reply_contents}, reply_regdate_modified = sysdate() where reply_id = #{reply_id}
mapper.select: select reply_id, post_id, reply_contents, user_nickname, reply_regdate, reply_regdate_modified from reply_spring where post_id = #{post_id} order by reply_id asc
